## Form.enterQueryMode() method

Enter the Query By Example mode for the specified block (and children)

**Signature:**

```typescript
enterQueryMode(block: string): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  block | string | The block for which to enter Query By Example mode. |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise indicating whether entering Query By Example mode was successful.
